wave_0_per_point11=

wave_0_per_point13=xoffset2=-1*(cos((time*pphase2)+pphase)*pheight);
wave_0_per_point14=
wave_0_per_point15=lrorient=if(below(cos((time*pphase2)+pphase),cos(((time-.1)*pphase2)+pphase)),0,1);
wave_0_per_point16=

wave_1_per_point12=x=px;

wave_1_per_point14=a=abs(sin(time*.2)*.3+(treb_att*.1));

shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=//prma init
per_frame_init_2=i=0;  
per_frame_init_3=loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_4=i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_5=t=0;
per_frame_init_6=t0=time;
per_frame_init_7=
per_frame_1=//decay=.1+abs(sin(time*.3)*.8);
per_frame_2=zoom=1;
per_frame_3=db = .75 * db + .25 * bass_att;
per_frame_4=bb = bb + .1 * db;
per_frame_5=dt = .75 * dt + .25 * treb_att;
per_frame_6=tt = tt + .1 * dt;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=q2 = sin(.225*bb+time-.25*tt);
per_frame_9=q3 = cos(.25*bb+time-.235*tt);
per_frame_10=wave_a=0;        warp=0;        q6=aspecty; 
per_frame_11=t=t+.001/fps;     c=bnot(frame%3);
per_frame_12=s1=15+5*sin(t);         s2=100*sin(t);
per_frame_13=i=0;    x=0;     y=0;    p1=0;    p2=0;
per_frame_14=loop(1024*c*4,
per_frame_15=p1 = s1*sin(i*s2);   
per_frame_16=p2 = -s1*cos(i*s2)+p1-p2;
per_frame_17=x=x+sin(p2);         y=y+cos(p2);
per_frame_18=gmegabuf(2*i)=x;      gmegabuf(2*i+1)=y;
per_frame_19=i=i+1;);
per_frame_20=///////////
per_frame_21=zoom=above(time-t0,.1);
per_frame_22=speed = 25; //// tweak
per_frame_23=t2=t2+1/fps;
per_frame_24=decay=1-t1;
per_frame_25=t1=t1+2*equal((.1*t2*speed)%20,0)/fps;
per_frame_26=t1=t1*above(0.2,(.1*t2*speed)%20);
per_frame_27=monitor=s2;
per_frame_28=q2=.004;
per_frame_29=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    float3 ret2 = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.00+0.5 ).x;
warp_8=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.98+0.5 ).y;
warp_9=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.96+0.5 ).z;   
warp_10=`    
warp_11=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_12=`    ret = ret- (ret*.5);
warp_13=`    ret = ret*(abs(GetBlur2(uv)-.5))*5;
warp_14=`    ret = ret - .01;
warp_15=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret += GetBlur1(uv)*1.2;
comp_5=`   ret = pow(ret, float3(0.5,0.7,1.4))*1.6;
comp_6=`}
